name: Union Royale
description:
A battle royale in which you can kill everyone OR team up and overthrow the whole game.

Converting people to your side increases your Persuasion. Killing people increases your Strength, but reduces your Persuasion. No-one listens to a murderer.

Your new friends will behave like you do - whether you choose to be peaceful or violent.

There's obviously lots more I'd like to add and polish, but unfortunately ran out of time. Such is the nature of game jams!

All 3d modelling, texturing and music is by myself. Animations were from Mixamo.
